definition: ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements

sentences.english: The smouldering wreck fumed thick black smoke.
sentences.chinese: 燃燒的殘骸冒出濃烈的黑煙。

sentences.english: Watery town Wuzhen near Jiaxing, Zhejiang is very typical of Jiangnan taste.
sentences.chinese: 浙江嘉興附近的烏鎮，具有濃烈的水鄉風味。

sentences.english: The Pomerol wine can be more robust than others in Bordeaux.
sentences.chinese: 龐馬魯葡萄酒比其他波爾多酒更爲濃烈。

sentences.english: Ripe and mature-tasting pear and apple flavors , some spicy notes mixed in .
sentences.chinese: 略帶桃，蘋果香，口感成熟豐厚，回味複雜濃烈。

sentences.english: The sweet orange and aniseed add intense aromas.
sentences.chinese: 香草茶中的甜橙和大茴香使口味俞加濃烈。

sentences.english: I never give up loving you just become strong, soundless and stir less.
sentences.chinese: 我從未放棄過愛你，只是濃烈變成無聲無息。

sentences.english: I don't like durians especially their strong odd smell.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡榴蓮，特別是那股濃烈的怪味。

sentences.english: The gentle acidity and marked fruitiness of a well balanced Pinot Gris perfectly complements roast pork with a stewed pear sauce.
sentences.chinese: 水果香味豐裕濃烈，完美融合了燉梨醬烤豬肉的美味。

sentences.english: And dinkum and powerful colour appears directer the soul that attacks a person.
sentences.chinese: 而純粹的並且濃烈的色彩似乎更直接侵襲人的靈魂。

sentences.english: Pale yellow with green lights. Firm with green apple and lemon flavors. Spicy notes on the finish.
sentences.chinese: 色澤淡黃泛青，口感呈蘋果和檸檬香，回味濃烈。

sentences.english: This sets the tone of the novel with a strong tragic sense on both history and ideal.
sentences.chinese: 這一切，構成了該書濃烈的歷史悲劇感與理想悲劇感。

sentences.english: An intense, straw-yellow and golden colour. Intense, open and complex nose.
sentences.chinese: 濃烈的麥稈黃色，色澤金黃。

sentences.english: Do bathroom cleaners need to be so harsh that the fumes make me choke?
sentences.chinese: 浴室清潔劑的氣味非要搞得弄濃烈的讓人窒息嗎？

sentences.english: The tang of Scotch , sweat and gun-metal rose from his pages.
sentences.chinese: 他的書頁中泛起蘇格蘭的，汗水和炮銅的濃烈氣息。

sentences.english: The Bai zest for business in even more obvious at the great market day scenes in Dali, Wase and Shaping.
sentences.chinese: 到了趕集的日子，白族風味的商業氣息更加濃烈。

sentences.english: Therc is an obvious and penetrative tragic consciousness in XIAO Hong' novels.
sentences.chinese: 蕭紅的小說浸潤着濃烈深刻的生命悲劇意識。

definition: dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
to mix together (disparate substances)/to mingle/a mix/to be tangled up with
implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
to smell/to sniff sth out/to perceive by smelling
to have guts/to have courage/to be brave
